about_the_game:
The European Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, liveries and rider suits, which will be added to your inventory to upgrade your Aprilia, BMW, Ducati and MV Agusta motorcycles.
- Aprilia: 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the RSV4 1100 Factory 2020
- BMW: 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the M 1000 RR 2021
- Ducati: 1 rider suit, 1 Black livery + 10 Performance parts for the Panigale V4 R 2020
- MV Agusta: F4 Claudio 2018 livery + 10 Performance parts for the F4 RC 2019
The parts pack also includes 16 Pirelli front tyres and 16 rear tyres, and 4 Brembo Stylema front brake calipers compatible with all four European motorcycles.
detailed_description:
The European Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, liveries and rider suits, which will be added to your inventory to upgrade your Aprilia, BMW, Ducati and MV Agusta motorcycles.
- Aprilia: 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the RSV4 1100 Factory 2020
- BMW: 1 rider suit + 10 Performance parts for the M 1000 RR 2021
- Ducati: 1 rider suit, 1 Black livery + 10 Performance parts for the Panigale V4 R 2020
- MV Agusta: F4 Claudio 2018 livery + 10 Performance parts for the F4 RC 2019
The parts pack also includes 16 Pirelli front tyres and 16 rear tyres, and 4 Brembo Stylema front brake calipers compatible with all four European motorcycles.

name: RiMS Racing: European Manufacturers Package

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy RiMS Racing: European Manufacturers Package

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVDIA GeForce GTX 750, 2 GB or AMD Radeon HD 7850, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX 580, 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: The European Manufacturers Pack includes 76 spare parts, 2 motorcycle liveries and 3 rider suits for Aprilia, BMW, Ducati and MV Agusta motorcycles.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
